lines.text: (Lloyd enters the room, slams the door in anger and collaspes on the ground)
I got robbed by a sweet old lady on a motorized cart. I didn't even see it coming.
Oh, don't worry about it Harry.
No, it gets worse Lloyd, you know my pet petee. He's dead.
Oh I'm sorry Harry, how did he die?
Ahh, that's it. I've had it with this dump. We've got no food, we got no jobs. Are pets heads are falling off!
What the hell are we doing here Harry?
